commands.command_en: Plan a high-quality residential community with plot ratio <=2.5, building density <=25%, green space ratio >=35%, high-rise spacing >=0.4x southern building height, ensuring min. 1-hour sunlight on winter solstice
Design commercial finance core zone with plot ratio 3.0-4.0, building density 40%, underground parking >=1 space per 100 sqm, building setback from road >=8 meters
Create TOD community with plot ratio 2.8-3.5 within 800m of metro station, commercial podiums along arterials, stepped residential heights, 90% coverage by transit stops within 300m
Build 2-star green building community with green space ratio >=40%, energy saving rate 65%, Low-E insulated glass, 30% rooftop solar coverage, full rainwater harvesting system
